name: Drei Konige Hotel Lucerne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: About a 10 minute walk from the train station in one direction and about the same to the river to a spot close to the Soreuerbruche, The hotel is clean, comfortable and the staff are very polite. Breakfast is fantastic, something for everyone - even for those of us who make a sandwich to take along for lunch. The restaurant is not over exciting, but basic "pub" food.
reviews.title: Great small hotel with perfect location

reviews.text: Very friendly staff. They allowed me to put my luggage in storage for an entire night prior to checkin because I needed to leave town. The hotel is in a good location, close to a few quiet, small bars, and just a few streets from the wooden bridge and some excellent cafes right on the lake. Not very far from the train station (10-minutes walk) and the room was good (good bed, has a fan, 5 english TV channels, quiet room, ok bathroom). The breakfast was good too, and it has an attractive restaurant that is a great place to just sit (not spectacular, just comfortable). I felt very welcome and was impressed by the value in such an expensive town.
reviews.title: Great value, Friendly

reviews.text: Stayed here a couple of nights.Good location for walking to everything.Laundry is right down the street.Not cheap but what is in Switzerland.Would stay here again.No a/c if it's warmer however there was a nice pedestal fan in our room.Service was great.Again, if your looking for a Hilton, book one this is a smaller hotel with less amenities
reviews.title: Good location

reviews.text: I am a tour director for an American company - I had a group of Americans in Switzerland last week and stayed two nights at this hotel. One of my group fell in a restaurant the first night and had emergency surgery overnight for a broken arm and badly dislocated shoulder. I had to leave with the rest of the group a day later, but the manager and front desk people at Drei Konige gave 5 star help in the emergency and took care of this couple for the next two days even to the point of helping them get to the train station the morning she was allowed to travel. Maybe a 3 star rated hotel but service and caring way beyond anything we could have ever expected. They made this older American couple as comfortable and reassured as possible.
reviews.title: Amazing level of caring service to guests

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in the hotel for 5 nights in August 2013. The Hotel is located 7 mins from the lake and the old city center and 10 mins from all transportation - trains, ships, etc. We had never have to use a bus inside Lucern. The rooms are big compared to other hotels with the same price in city center. It is clean, and the breakfast is has some comparable variety. It has noodle soup, 2 kinds of sausages, cheeses, eggs, vegetables, bread, cakes, juices, jams, yogurt, fruits and more. The beds are comfortable, worm, and big. The room and the bathroom is clean and new. I would definitely return to this hotel if I were again in Lucern. I think this is the maximum you can get for the price you pay. If I had to say something negative I would say that I've been to hotels where the staff was friendlier.
reviews.title: Clean, worm, close, good breakfast, not too pricy.

reviews.text: This hotel is deceiving. Upon arrival, one would expect to be staying in the hotel - after all that is what was booked. I was taken to a building around the corner/out the back which appears to have been turned into additional rooms which are large but feel hollow and old.
reviews.title: Beyond Disappointed
